name: Never Night
description:
An envious eye was cast onto Jubilee,  a place of peace and joy, where any kind of little monster could find a safe habour. 

With evil plans in place, all of Jubilee faces the forever night.

"Never Night" is a 3D platformer game, where you have to survive each level, until you face evil at the end.

How to play?
  • Movement - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Look Around - Mouse
  • Attack - Jump on top of your enemy to make it explode.
  • Pause Menu - Esc
